about:
Hi! My name is Nicholas Yim, and I am currently pursuing a double major in Computer Science & Electrical and Computer Engineering at Rutgers University. 

Over the past few years, I have explored many opportunities to gain as much exposure and experience as I can within software development. I aim to continue on this path with the goal of pursuing a career as a **Software Engineer**. I am open to any positions related to software engineering and full-stack development. Please feel free to contact me!
